CustomField.formula: OR( IF(AND( CONTAINS(X3rd_Party_Assigned__c,$User.Email), Creative_Agency_Access_To_Salesforce__r.Profile.Name = "Third Party Community User"), true, false), IF(AND( CONTAINS(X3rd_Party_Assigned__c,$User.Email), Creative_Agency_2__r.Profile.Name = "Third Party Community User"), true, false), IF(AND( CONTAINS(X3rd_Party_Assigned__c,$User.Email), Creative_Agency_3__r.Profile.Name = "Third Party Community User"), true, false), IF(AND( CONTAINS(X3rd_Party_Assigned__c,$User.Email), Creative_Agency_4__r.Profile.Name = "Third Party Community User"), true, false), false)
CustomField.label: Is logged in User assigned
